EmailTemplate.subject: Your Shell Account Has Been Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your Shell Fuel Card account has been approved under our Direct Debit Program. With this plan, we simply debit your fleet program balance directly from your checking account three times monthly for the previous month’s transactions.
I am attaching the form you need to complete to get set up on Direct Debit. Please take a few moments to fill this out and then fax it back to me at {!User.Fax}, along with a voided check.
Once I receive the form, I will call you to verify the setup of your account prior to issuing your cards. Meanwhile, if you have any questions please just give me a call.
Thank you for choosing the Shell Fuel Card program.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Fax - {!User.Fax} {!User.Email}
